## Pacchetti

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
dat <- read.csv(here::here('data', '4.01_point_data.csv')) 

# convert data as date in lubridate
dat <- dat |> mutate(d = ymd(time))



summary(dat)
```

```{r}
ggplot(dat, aes(d, CHL)) +
	geom_line()
```
